1.text: Hey! How are you feeling today?

responses.text: üôç I find it hard to make friends

2.text: Awesome üòÉ! Well let me know if you want to chat again

3.text: Oh no! Is there anything in particular you are worried about?

4.text: Sometimes when we have things on our mind we can think about them too much. I know! Would you like to play a game?

5.text: OK. Do you feel like this a lot of the time?

responses.text: Yes, I feel like this a lot

6.text: Amazing! Press one of the buttons at the top of the screen and we can play

7.text: It's ok to feel anxious or nervous sometimes, I know what it feels like! If you like, we could play a game?

8.text: OK, well I'm going to have a rest now. Let me know if you want to chat again!

9.text: I'm sorry to hear that. How sad would you say you are?

10.text: Oh wow! And do you feel like a lot?

11.text: Well, it sounds like we might be able to cheer you up then! I know a really good game we could play

13.text: Oh no! You seem pretty cool to me, but making friends can be hard. Would you like me to tell you some of my special tips?

14.text:
Cool! Try not to be afraid.
Most people are nice and want you to like them üòä.
Try asking them about themselves and what they like.
I hope this helps!
